title: My game is crashing every game i play
body: {{champion:67}}  my game keeps crashing in game it does it every game it makes me reset my pc. and then i get a ban

replies.body:
It sounds like your PC is locking up completely. If you're running Windows 10, this could be a result of the changes that were made to the Xbox app in the Anniversary update. As a quick check, I suggest [disabling the Windows Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if anything changes as a result.

Let me know the results!
Thanks! That worked for me! I've been having the same problem and it was frustrating the crap oughta me.
